titles.title: With All The Power In Heaven And Earth (famili

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}With all the pow'r in heaven and earth Our resurrected Lord's endued If we unite and live by Him The enemy will be subdued{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In Jesus' name we must declare That we shall overcome the foe We draw authority from Him The seprent's head to crush below{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No matter what - thou mountain high In heav'n or earth where'er thou art At any cost we'll level thee In Jesus' name thou must depart{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Faith orders thee "Remove from here And be thou cast into the sea" We should we must we can we will Fulfill God's purpose faithfully{/lang-eng}
